column1: Uchi////Now that I've been here a second time
column2: I'm ready for this review!!!! Some friends from Oklahoma drove down to visit and they were like..."oh hey let's go to Uchi". And I'm thinking
column4: why here?!" I seriously thought we were here to drink. I mean... this place has 4 DOLLAR SIGNS. That totally means if you're ready to spend then you should seriously go. Also I'm super glad I live in the area. I literally walked to Uchi. If I didn't
column5: I would have missed out eating with my friends.
